content: this pattern is for the patriotic pinwheel for the 4th of july decorations as an example i have made my pinwheel in two sizes using different yarn weights the larger pinwheel is made from medium weight #4 yarn and will be great for home and outdoor decor the smaller pinwheel is made from crochet thread #3 and can be used as an applique for various embellishments the large pinwheel is about 7 in diameter the small pinwheel is about 4 in diameter the pattern uses crochet us terms free version of this pattern is available on my website https //www goldenlucycrafts com/crochet-patriotic-pinwheel/ by purchasing a pdf file you will receive the pattern in a print-friendly styled and advertisement-free pdf file format
